title: Tucker font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tucker_6178.jpg)

Can someone ID? I thought it was Bodoni but not?
author: SF

comments.content:
Hey there,

it reminds me of Bodoni FB, because of the very geometrical, triangle cut hooks from the ‘T’, but the ‘k’ is slightly different. Also it looks slanted to me.

regards,  
Florian
Thx. Ya the 'k' is throwing me off. Maybe it was hand drawn, base off Bodoni.
